column4: Could someone tell me if the error in fglrxinfo could be the cause of my problems? http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/29785/
What command sets it up, do you know?
did you put the Composite "disable" line ?
Should all of those be in Section "Device" ?
Those last two, VideoOverlay and OpenGLOverlay are missing, I'll add them and restart the X server
No more error but it's still running MESA
look for a line that says disabling dri
I filtered to show just dri and see nothing that says that
I see DRI init failed. Screen 0 is not DRI capable.
